name.label: Name
name.description: Please enter your full name, or a display name.

sessions.label: Sessions
sessions.instructions: Click on a session to end it.

deleteAccount.label: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
deleteAccount.instructions: Please confirm the deletion of your account. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
